extension.name: System - Hikashop Social Plugin
extension.author: Hikashop
extension.description: This plugin enables you to add a Facebook "like" button and a Twitter button

param.name: display_fb
param.label: Display Facebook button
param.description: Display or not the Facebook like button

param.name: display_twitter
param.label: Dislpay Twitter button
param.description: Display or not the twitter button to share the product page

param.name: display_google
param.label: Display Google +1 button
param.description: Display or not Google +1 button

param.name: display_pinterest
param.label: Display Pinterest button
param.description: Display or not Pinterest button

param.name: display_addThis
param.label: Display AddThis button
param.description: Display or not AddThis button

param.name: position
param.label: Button position
param.description: Postion of the twitter and facebook buttons on your product page

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: The width of your div (in px)

param.name: fb_tag
param.label: Tag type
param.description: Coding language used for implementing the Facebook button

param.name: fb_style
param.label: Facebook display style
param.description: Choose the style of the facebook button

param.name: fb_faces
param.label: Show Facebook faces
param.description: Show or not the face of the people who used your Facebook button

param.name: fb_send
param.label: Show Send button
param.description: Show or not the send button next to the like button (doesn't work if you use the iframe)

param.name: fb_verb
param.label: Verb to display
param.description: Choose the verb to display on your button

param.name: fb_theme
param.label: Color theme
param.description: The color of the Facebook button

param.name: fb_font
param.label: Facebook button Font
param.description: The font of the Facebook button

param.name: fb_type
param.label: Product type
param.description: Type of the linked content

param.name: admin
param.label: Facebook admin
param.description: The name or ID of your facebook account

param.name: twitter_count
param.label: Twitter count display
param.description: Choose the style of the twitter count display

param.name: twitter_text
param.label: Tweet text
param.description: If you want to display a special text into the tweet. If this field is empty, the name of the page will be used.

param.name: twitter_mention
param.label: Mention to
param.description: Name of the account which will be mentioned in the tweet

param.name: google_size
param.label: Google button size
param.description: Choose the size of the Google +1 button

param.name: google_count
param.label: Show Google count
param.description: Show or not the number of person who used this button

param.name: pinterest_display
param.label: Pinterest count display
param.description: Choose the style of the Pinterest count display

param.name: addThis_display
param.label: addThis display
param.description: Choose the style of the addThis button

param.name: services_exclude
param.label: Services exclude
param.description: Services you don't want to display (i.e. 'myspace, facebook'). You can find the list of service here: http://www.addthis.com/services/list#.UbXcsj6VBVU
